Installation and system requirements
The &SCSCP; package is designed for the coming soon &GAP;4.5 and will be not compatible with previous releases of &GAP;4.
Until the release of &GAP;4.5, the &SCSCP; package works only with the &GAP; development version.
To use the &SCSCP; package it is necessary to install &GAP;4 packages &IO; , &GAPDoc; and (currently only development version of) &openmath; .
To install the &SCSCP; package, the scscp directory (that is, the one containing subdirectories doc and lib) must be placed into pkg directory of your &GAP; installation.
When you don't have access to the directory of your main &GAP; installation, you can also install the package outside the &GAP; main directory by unpacking it inside a directory MYGAPDIR/pkg. Then to be able to load &SCSCP; you need to call &GAP; with the -l ";MYGAPDIR" option.
